nodes.name: Passion Surge
nodes.desc:
When Melody is active, there is a 15% fixed chance per second to gain Passion Surge.

Passion Surge: Special Attack costs zero Performance Passion for 10s. Removed after Special Attack is cast.

nodes.name: Intellect Conversion
nodes.desc: Every 10 points of Intellect provides 1 point of MATK.

nodes.name: Melody Chord
nodes.desc:
Melody Healing +20%.
Each 1% Haste increases the REG SPD of Performance Passion by 1%.

nodes.name: Flame Pursuit
nodes.desc: After using 3 Special Attacks, the next Basic Attack hit triggers Flame Pillar Blast.

nodes.name: Arcane Ascension
nodes.desc: Special Attack costs 1 less Performance Passion.

nodes.name: Heat Surge
nodes.desc:
When Melody is activated, the trigger chance for Passion Surge +an extra 3% every 1 second (up to 30%).

Passion Surge: Special Attack costs zero Performance Passion for 10s. Removed after Special Attack is cast.

nodes.name: Variation
nodes.desc:
Increases Max HP by 20% and activates Dissonance Spec with its original effect intact.
If Concerto Spec is activated, its effect is adjusted to replace Basic Attack with String Strum.

nodes.name: Flame Pursuit II
nodes.desc: Flame Pillar Blast becomes a two-hit combo.

nodes.name: Melody Heat Core
nodes.desc: Melody heals ally targets below 50% HP with 100% bonus effect.

nodes.name: Heat Boost
nodes.desc: When Intellect reaches 500, the Performance Energy cap +20%.

nodes.name: Dissonance Spec
nodes.desc:
While in Rhapsody of Flame, increases all Luck Chance acquired by any means by 50%.

Healing of Stillness: If you deal no DMG to enemies for 5s, each hit of your Basic Attack will heal up to 10 allies (prioritizing Allies), with the full 4-hit combo restoring 15.05% of their max HP in total.

nodes.name: Severed Chapter
nodes.desc:
Increases Resilience Break Efficiency of self and Allies within 30 meters by 10%. This effect cannot stack.
After activating Heroic Melody, you and Allies within 30 meters deal 10% more DMG to defeated targets. This effect cannot stack.

nodes.name: Sound Blaze
nodes.desc:
Gains 1 Soundwave Energy each time you deal DMG equal to 10 times ATK.
Soundwave Energy stores up to 50.
Skills consuming Performance Passion trigger Scorching Impact when dealing DMG, consuming all Soundwave Energy. Each 1 Soundwave Energy increases Scorching Impact DMG by 10%.

nodes.name: Trio Rhapsody
nodes.desc: Rhapsody of Flame always appears in its most powerful form. While in Rhapsody of Flame, healing +20%.

nodes.name: Luck Multiplier
nodes.desc:
Every 1% Luck grants 0.5% Lucky Hit DMG Multiplier.
After activating Heroic Melody, doubles its conversion efficiency.

nodes.name: Swing Reflux
nodes.desc: Hitting a target with Fierce Strike recovers 5 Performance Energy. Each additional target hit provides 1 extra Performance Energy, up to 10 total.

nodes.name: Restart
nodes.desc: When Harmonic Anthem or Fierce Strike triggers a Lucky Hit, limited to a single activation when striking multiple targets, immediately resets Rhapsody of Flame's CD and allows Rhapsody of Flame not to consume Performance Passion for 10s, this effect is nullified upon casting Rhapsody of Flame.

nodes.name: Fire Day
nodes.desc: Increases Fire Bonus by 8% when attacking Elite or higher targets.

nodes.name: Healing Note
nodes.desc:
Basic Attack deals an extra instance of DMG.
For every 5 Soundwave Energy obtained, creates a Note for the ally with the lowest HP (Allies prioritized).

nodes.name: Lucky Soundwave
nodes.desc: Gains 1 Soundwave Energy whenever Expertise Skill or Amplified Beat trigger a Lucky Hit.

nodes.name: Rhythm Spirit
nodes.desc: Defeating an enemy has a fixed 50% chance to grant you 1 Performance Passion.

nodes.name: Indomitable Chord
nodes.desc: While Heroic Melody is active, grants Super Armor, increases DMG Reduction by 25%, and boosts movement speed by 10%.

nodes.name: Blazing Heal
nodes.desc: Stores excess Healing (up to 500% of Max HP). After activating Heroic Melody, consumes stored Healing to recover allies' HP every 1 second, up to 15% of Max HP per second.

nodes.name: Infinite Rhapsody
nodes.desc: Replace Ultimate Rock the Stage with Infinite Rhapsody.

nodes.name: Resonant Counterpoint
nodes.desc: When a Note forms, there's a 50% fixed chance to create an extra Note for a different target.

nodes.name: Soundwave Overclock
nodes.desc: Upon casting Center Stage, grants 15 Soundwave Energy, and doubles all the Soundwave Energy gained in the next 10s.

nodes.name: Encore Persistance
nodes.desc:
Permanently benefits from Encore effect.
For every 5 triggers of Encore Strings, the next Amplified Beat and Harmonic Anthem deal 50% more DMG.

nodes.name: Flame's Rampage
nodes.desc:
When Heroic Melody is active, Rhapsody of Flame will erupt, dealing Magic Damage equal to 50% ATK every 3s to targets it touches (DMG interval affected by Haste).
While in Rhapsody of Flame, each hit of Harmonic Anthem also heals 1 ally with the lowest HP for 30% of the DMG dealt.

nodes.name: Flame Note
nodes.desc: When you use an Expertise Skill, Rhapsody of Flame will erupt with Rhythm, dealing Magic Damage equal to 100% of ATK and granting Note to allies it touches.

nodes.name: Sonic Therapy
nodes.desc: Converted healing from DMG +20% for targets affected by Note.

nodes.name: Encore Sharp Strike
nodes.desc: Triggering Encore Strings to deal DMG or healing grants 2 Performance Energy. If the Encore Strings triggers Lucky Hit, grants 3 additional Performance Energy.

nodes.name: Encore Chain
nodes.desc: When Encore Strings triggers, it activates a second time on the same target.

nodes.name: Concerto
nodes.desc:
During Rhapsody of Flame, Amplified Beat gains 1 additional attack.
Amplified Beat's DMG -20%.

nodes.name: Zenith Center Stage: Mad Tune
nodes.desc: Each Performance Passion consumed reduces the CD of Center Stage by 1 second.

nodes.name: Sonic Cure
nodes.desc: When Expertise deal DMG (only triggers once when hitting multiple targets), additionally heal targets with Note.

nodes.name: Encore Luck Boost
nodes.desc: Every 1% Luck Chance grants 1% trigger chance for Encore Strings.

nodes.name: Critical Acclaim
nodes.desc:
During Center Stage, triggering Encore Strings has a 30% fixed chance to grant Passion Surge.
Passion Surge: Special Attack costs zero Performance Passion for 10s. Removed after Special Attack is cast.

nodes.name: Tower Multiwave
nodes.desc: Casting Center Stage immediately extends Heroic Melody by 5s.

nodes.name: Finale Command
nodes.desc: Within 10s of casting Encore, each use of Rhapsody of Flame caused targets affected by Encore to trigger Encore Strings.

nodes.name: Absolute Center Stage
nodes.desc: After you use Center Stage, the number of enhanced skills increases from 1 to 2.

nodes.name: Stat Resonance
nodes.desc: While Healing Melody is active, grants allies appropriate buffs (Strength, Intellect, Agility) equal to 8% of Intellect. (Buffs from different Soul Musicians cannot stack. Only one with the highest value applies.)

nodes.name: Brilliant Charge
nodes.desc: When Healing Beat or Passion Burst applies Crit Healing or deals Crit DMG (triggers only once when hitting multiple targets), gains 1 Performance Passion.

nodes.name: Passion Burst: Ferver
nodes.desc: For each 10 Performance Passion consumed, enhances Passion Burst to Passion Burst for 10s.

nodes.name: Crit Scale
nodes.desc:
Increases Crit Rate by 10% against enemies above 50% HP.
Increases Crit Rate by 10% against enemies below 50% HP.

nodes.name: Rhythm Spirit
nodes.desc: Defeating an enemy has a fixed 50% chance to grant you 1 Performance Passion.

nodes.name: Crit Charge Rhythm
nodes.desc: Fivefold Crescendo deals Crit DMG or healing (only triggers once for multiple targets), grants 2 Performance Energy. When Healing Melody lands a Crit Hit, grants 1 Performance Energy (only triggers once for multiple targets).

nodes.name: Fire Day
nodes.desc: Increases Fire Bonus by 8% when attacking Elite or higher targets.

nodes.name: Sonic Verdict
nodes.desc: While Healing Melody is active, Fivefold Crescendo deals bonus DMG equal to its healing ratio.

nodes.name: Heated Tower Flame Blast
nodes.desc: When Passion Burst and its enhanced version (Passion Burst) hit the speaker, it immediately releases a Flame Shock.

nodes.name: Crescendo Healing Chord
nodes.desc: For every second Healing Melody remains active, enhances its Healing by 7%, stacking up to 5 times.

nodes.name: Stat Resonance Crit
nodes.desc: For 10s after using Passion Burst or its enhanced form (Passion Burst), doubles the buffs that Healing Melody provides to allies.

nodes.name: Fiery Beat
nodes.desc:
Healing Beat Crit Rate +10%.
Healing Beat Healing +10%.

nodes.name: Concert Circuit
nodes.desc: Replace Ultimate Rock the Stage with Concert Circuit.

nodes.name: Vitality Unleash
nodes.desc: 7% of DMG dealt and 15% of healing done is stored as Rhythm. Within 10s after you cast Center Stage, the use of Expertise and Healing Beat consumes Rhythm to grant up to 40% bonus healing. The cap for Rhythm storage is 30 times MATK.

nodes.name: Tower Flame Blast
nodes.desc: The speaker releases a Flame Shock every 5s.

nodes.name: Tower Resonance
nodes.desc:
Permanently benefits from Encore effect.
Each trigger of Encore Strings reduces the remaining CD of Expertise by 1 second.

nodes.name: Double Recovery Note
nodes.desc: Healing Beat provides an additional equal Healing to targets under the influence of Healing Melody.

nodes.name: Harmonic Amplifier
nodes.desc: Increases the DMG dealt and healing of Expertise triggered by the speaker by 30%.

nodes.name: Encore Chain
nodes.desc: When Encore Strings triggers, it activates a second time on the same target.

nodes.name: Stat Resonance Overload
nodes.desc: For 15s after actively casting Encore, the stat bonuses provided by Healing Melody are +100%.

nodes.name: Symphonic Aria
nodes.desc: Enhances Healing by 10% for targets affected by Healing Melody.

nodes.name: Zenith Center Stage: Concerto
nodes.desc: The charges of Center Stage increase by 1.

nodes.name: Multi-Target Heat Amp
nodes.desc: Passion Burst and its enhanced version (Passion Burst) deal 5% more DMG per additional target hit, up to 25%.

nodes.name: Critical Encore
nodes.desc: Every 1% Crit Rate grants 1% trigger chance for Encore Strings.

nodes.name: Critical Acclaim
nodes.desc:
During Center Stage, triggering Encore Strings has a 30% fixed chance to grant Passion Surge.

Passion Surge: Special Attack costs zero Performance Passion for 10s. Removed after Special Attack is cast.

nodes.name: Spiral Flame
nodes.desc: After casting Center Stage, summon a wave of Sonic Surge.

nodes.name: Encore Chain
nodes.desc: Within 10s after you cast Encore, each use of Expertise Skill triggers Encore Strings for targets affected by Encore.

nodes.name: Absolute Center Stage
nodes.desc: After you use Center Stage, the number of enhanced skills increases from 1 to 2.
